data.text: Mixi yo tinma marasi ra, na wama lɔnni nan xɔn,
Alatala hinnɛma nɛ mixi fanyi ra,
Ɲaaxuɲa mu xili xungbe fima mixi ma,
Ginɛ fanyi findima a xa mɔri xa xunnakeli nan na,
Mixi tinxinxie xa maɲɔxunyi fan,
Mixi ɲaaxi xa wɔyɛnyi mixi faxama nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxie xa fe fama nɛ kanade,
Ɲama lɔnnilae matɔxɔma nɛ,
Yɛtɛ magore, malima keren peti na naxan bɛ,
Tinxintɔɛ mɛɛnima nɛ a xa xuruse ma,
Bɔxi rawali baloe sɔtɔma nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi harige fenma tinxintareya ra,
Fe ɲaaxi findima gantanyi nan na mixi ɲaaxi bɛ,
Wɔyɛn fanyi findima xunnakeli nan na mixi bɛ,
Lɔnnitare a maɲɔxunxi a a xaxili fan,
Lɔnnitare bɔɲɛ te rafura,
Tinxintɔɛ nɔndi nan falama a boore xun,
Mixi dɛ wuyaxi xa wɔyɛnyi mixi maxɔnɔma nɛ alɔ santidɛgɛma,
Nɔndi falɛ xa masenyi mu masarama,
Maifui nan na mixi ɲaaxi bɔɲɛ kui,
Fe ɲaaxi yo mu tinxintɔɛ lima,
Alatala wule falɛe xɔnma nɛ,
Lɔnnila a xa lɔnni masen tɛmui kolon,
Tunnabɛxilae findima mangɛe nan na,
Kɔntɔfili luma nɛ mixi lahalɛ masara ra,
Tinxintɔɛ kira tinxinxi masenma nɛ a boore bɛ,
Koyinma tunnaxɔnɛ mu a xa tɔɔkɛ ganma,
Simaya na kira tinxinxi nan xɔn ma.
